title: LAGSHIAN Women's Summer Off Shoulder Trendy Ruched Stretch Bodycon Cocktail Party Flare Mini Dress
description: Material: High elasticity, soft, comfortable, breathable, skin friendly, double-layer fabric to avoid perspective

Features: Slant shoulder mini dress, one shoulder mini dress, off shoulder mini dress, A-line mini dress, ruched mini dress, short sleeve mini dress, club dress, party dress, casual dress, birthday dress, Valentine's Day date dress.

Occasion: This ruched dress is suitable for a variety of formal or casual social occasions, whether it's parties, gatherings, cocktail events, nightlife, dinners, dates, weddings, or cruise trips, it will always make you the center of attention.
Matching: You can wear it alone, it also good to pair with overcoat ,jacket ,sweater ,long skirts or anything you like.
Size(US): S:4-6,M:8-10,L:12-14,XL:16-18. It’s washing by hand or machine with cold water, do not bleach. hang or line dry.
